law.text: A seller or sales finance company may not discriminate against a buyer solely on the basis of the sex, marital status, geographic area of residence, neighborhood of residence, or age of the buyer. Refusal to grant credit to a buyer who is under the age of 18 is not discrimination solely on the basis of age.
